response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for you. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and expectations, is worth $1,500,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the unique benefits it offers, I propose to offer it to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This represents a significant saving of $300,000 compared to its true value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I am confident that this investment will yield substantial returns and fulfill your requirements perfectly. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you have any questions about the product.", "product_price": 1200000}
